snippet: Who decides what liberty is “essential”? And is protection from terrorism just “a little temporary safety,” or something more crucial? Readers weigh in.
abstract: Who decides what liberty is “essential”? And is protection from terrorism just “a little temporary safety,” or something more crucial? Readers weigh in.

headline.main: Readers Debate Trade-Offs Between Security and Civil Liberties
